id.description: Unique identifier for the user profile, same as the user's UID.

discordUsername.description: The user's Discord username or ID for tagging (e.g., @user or <@ID>).

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

rosterStatus.description: The player's status on the active team roster.

playstyleTags.description: A list of tags describing the user's preferred playstyle.

lastNotificationReadTimestamp.description: The ISO 8601 timestamp of the last notification read by the user.

Vote.title: Vote
Vote.description: Represents a user's vote for a specific time slot or event.

id.description: Unique identifier for the vote, composite of userId and timeslot or eventId.

timeslot.description: The time slot that the vote is for (e.g., '2024-07-20_4:30 PM'). Required for grid compatibility.

voteValue.description: Indicates whether the user is available (true).

eventId.description: Optional reference to a specific ScheduledEvent ID for event-specific votes.

ScheduledEvent.title: ScheduledEvent
ScheduledEvent.description: Represents a scheduled training session or tournament.

creatorId.description: The UID of the user who created the event.

date.description: The date of the event in 'yyyy-MM-dd' format.

time.description: The time of the event (e.g., '6:30 PM').

isRecurring.description: Indicates if the event is part of a weekly recurring series.

imageURL.description: URL for an optional image or screenshot for the event.

description.description: A detailed description or notes for the event.

status.description: The current status of the event.

discordRoleId.description: The ID of the Discord role to mention in notifications (e.g., '1234567890').

AvailabilityOverride.title: AvailabilityOverride
AvailabilityOverride.description: Represents an admin's manual override for a user's availability for a specific event.

AppNotification.title: AppNotification
AppNotification.description: Represents a global notification about an application event.

message.description: The content of the notification message.

timestamp.description: The ISO 8601 timestamp when the notification was created.

createdBy.description: The username of the user who triggered the notification.

icon.description: A lucide-react icon name to display with the notification.

EventBanner.title: EventBanner
EventBanner.description: Represents a banner image saved in the team's shared gallery.

url.description: The storage URL of the image.

admin.description: Grants the user administrative privileges across the application.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile data. The document ID is the user's UID.

/votes/{voteId}.description: Stores individual user votes for time slots or events. Document ID is a composite key for easy upserts.

/scheduledEvents/{eventId}.description: Stores information about scheduled events. Rules allow any authenticated user to read, but only an admin to write or delete.

/availabilityOverrides/{overrideId}.description: Stores manual availability overrides set by admins.

/appNotifications/{notificationId}.description: Stores global app notifications for all users to see.

/eventBanners/{bannerId}.description: Stores reusable banner images in a shared team gallery.
